title: Sweet Tower of Pisa
story: Children everywhere make beautifully decorated gingerbread houses, but here they are standard. At the North Pole, we build marshmallow towers and try to get as high as we can.
shortstory: Marshmallow towers instead of gingerbread houses.
content: Each player builds a marshmallow tower. You always stack 1 on top of another. The game is over when the tower falls.
points: Enter the number of marshmallow layers in your respective #field.
